history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER going to the airport the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Fifth and Atwood Fifth and Atwood this in Atwood
TTS Okay, going to atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER No, I'm going to the airport from Vista Network.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, leaving from city vista. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER obey
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER I would like to travel today. I would like to travel today.
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:13 pm.
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 42 minutes, and you will take 2 busses..
Walk for about 12 mins to Greentree Rd at Parkway Center Dr South..
Take the 38 ,to Stanwix St at Forbes avenue. It will depart at 1:35pm..
Walk for about 2 mins to Liberty avenue at Fifth avenue..
Take the 28X ,to Pittsburgh International airport lower level. It will depart at 2:13pm..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER s
